name: Blast
full_text: Blast creates an area attack using a Medium Blast Template. Targets inside take 2d6 damage (or 3d6 with a raise). Damage type depends on trappings (fire, ice, etc).
notes: Remember that Blast cannot be cast in close combat without provoking free attacks. Templates cannot overlap unless using different sources.

name: Holy Symbol
summary: Protects the bearer against evil creatures.
full_text: When invoked, the bearer radiates faith that wards off supernatural foes. Evil entities must make a Spirit roll to attack directly. The effect lasts for 5 rounds.
notes: Only characters with a holy background (Miracles) may use this power. Requires a visible symbol of faith.
